definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
to catch sight of in a doorway (old)
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: To clarify the weight to load and the flatbed's rated load; it can not be overloaded.
sentences.chinese: 要弄清所载物的重量和平板车的额定负荷，不能超载。

sentences.english: The railroad has been piggybacking for quite a number of years.
sentences.chinese: 许多年来铁路上一直用火车平板车装运。

sentences.english: It sat on top of a small flatbed with wooden wheels, drawn by the yoked oxen from the field.
sentences.chinese: 灵柩被安置在木轮的平板车上，由上了轭的水牛拉着。

sentences.english: Public works trucks line up to load sand onto their flatbeds.
sentences.chinese: 公共工程车辆成排地往平板车上装沙子。

sentences.english: So she found a flat truck and took him to the doctor for acupuncturing every other day.
sentences.chinese: 她找来一辆平板车，每两天就拉着他翻山去扎一次针。

sentences.english: He took away our big color television on a flatbed tricycle.
sentences.chinese: 他用平板车拉走了我家的大彩电。

sentences.english: It is unparallel that track pile driver can be transferred with a flat truck.
sentences.chinese: 步履桩机用一辆平板车转场此为先例。

sentences.english: Steering system is the core component of shipyard transporter.
sentences.chinese: 转向系统是大型平板车行驶的核心部件。

definition: open-topped container (mounted on a truck or cart) for carrying loads/dump box (of a dump truck)/bucket (of a front loader)/wheelbarrow
